idea-plugin.name: WebViewPlugin
idea-plugin.description: 此插件为IDEA集成开发环境添加了一个内置浏览器功能， 允许开发者在不离开IDE的情况下： - 高效浏览网页 - 测试前端代码 - 查阅在线文档 极大提升了开发效率。

This plugin adds an integrated browser feature to the IDEA development environment, allowing developers to: - Efficiently browse web pages - Test front-end code - Consult online documentation All without leaving the IDE, greatly improving development efficiency.

action.description: Open a WebView in a ToolWindow
